articles.title: U.S. detention of European and Canadian tourists creates fear over traveling to America - PBS NewsHour
articles.description: Since President Donald Trump took office, there have been multiple incidents of tourists being stopped at U.S. border crossings and held for weeks at U.S. immigration detention facilities before being allowed to fly home at their own expense.
